backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining user profiles with authorization checks and full CRUD operations for publishers, including active-state toggling.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented UI components, related files, dependencies, and test IDs for conductor CRUD features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purposes of various frontend files including pages, hooks, components, and styles.
frontend/.env: Environment file configuring the Internet Identity provider URL.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables defining light and dark theme tokens for the app.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document mounting the React app and loading the main entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React routing setup handling authentication, layout rendering, and all application routes including the conductors page.
frontend/src/components/conductors/Condu: Create/edit modal for trained conductors with publisher selection, training date, status fields, and backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/conductors/Delet: Confirmation dialog that deletes a conductor using a mutation hook and shows a loading state.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main app layout with sidebar, header, routed content area, and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Header with menu toggle and logout functionality that clears identity and query cache.
frontend/src/components/layout/Sidebar.t: Collapsible navigation sidebar with links, active state highlighting, and mobile overlay behavior.
frontend/src/components/notes/AddGlobalN: Modal for creating or editing global notes with validation, publisher attachment, and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/notes/GlobalNote: Displays a global note with category badge, preview, date, and edit/delete actions.
frontend/src/components/pioneers/AddPion: Form modal for adding a pioneer by selecting an active publisher and service year, with validation and mutation.
frontend/src/components/pioneers/DeleteP: Confirmation dialog for deleting a pioneer record using a mutation and showing success/error toasts.
frontend/src/components/pioneers/EditPio: Modal for editing a pioneer's assigned publisher and service year, with validation and mutation submission.
frontend/src/components/publishers/AddPu: Modal for creating a new publisher with fields for name, group, privileges, and activity status.
frontend/src/components/publishers/EditP: Modal for editing publisher details including name, group, privileges, and activity indicators.
frontend/src/components/shepherding/Edit: Modal for editing a shepherding visit, including publisher, date, and elders present, with validation and update mutation.
frontend/src/components/shepherding/Reco: Modal for recording a new shepherding visit with publisher selection, date, elders present, and validation.
frontend/src/components/tasks/AddTaskMod: Modal form for creating a task with validation, date conversion, and mutation submission.
frontend/src/components/tasks/EditTaskMo: Modal for editing an existing task, preloading task data and submitting updates.
frontend/src/components/territories/AddT: Modal for adding a new territory with basic validation and creation mutation.
frontend/src/components/territories/Chec: Table displaying sorted checkout history with optional edit actions.
Modal to check out a territory by selecting a publisher and marking campaign status.
frontend/src/components/territories/Dele: Confirmation dialog to delete a territory note using a mutation.
frontend/src/components/territories/Edit: Modal for editing a territory checkout record, including publisher selection, dates, and campaign flag with update mutation.
Modal for editing a territory’s number and type with validation and update mutation.
Modal for editing a territory note’s content using an update mutation.
frontend/src/components/territories/Terr: Card component displaying a territory note with edit and delete actions.
Section for creating, listing, editing, and deleting territory notes with sorting and modals.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the backend actor based on identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAddPublisher.ts: Mutation hook for adding a new publisher, mapping privilege options and invalidating publisher queries.
Mutation hook to check out a territory and invalidate related territory queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateGlobalNote.t: Mutation hook for creating global notes with validation and optional publisher attachment.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreatePioneer.ts: Mutation hook to create a pioneer and refresh the pioneers list.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateShepherdingV: Mutation hook to create a shepherding visit and invalidate related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateTask.ts: Creates a task via mutation and invalidates all task queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateTerritory.ts: Creates a new territory with a generated ID and refreshes the territories list.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateTrainedCondu: Adds a trained conductor and invalidates the list with success/error toasts.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeleteGlobalNote.t: Deletes a global note by ID and refreshes global notes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeletePioneer.ts: Deletes a pioneer by ID and invalidates the pioneers list.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeletePublisher.ts: Deletes a publisher with optimistic updates and refetches the list.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeleteTask.ts: Deletes a task by ID and invalidates all task queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeleteTrainedCondu: Deletes a trained conductor and refreshes the list with toast feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useGlobalNotes.ts: Provides queries to fetch all global notes or a specific note by ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity login, state management, and provider context.
frontend/src/hooks/usePioneers.ts: Fetches all pioneers when the actor is ready.
frontend/src/hooks/usePublisherNotes.ts: Empty file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Fetches all publishers or a specific publisher by ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useServiceMeetingCond: Fetches all service meeting conductor assignments.
frontend/src/hooks/useShepherdingVisit.t: Provides queries and mutations to fetch, update, or delete a single shepherding visit.
frontend/src/hooks/useTasks.ts: Fetches tasks by status or a specific task by ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useTerritory.ts: Fetches, updates, deletes, and changes status of individual territories with cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useTerritoryNotes.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating territory notes with automatic cache invalidation.
Fetches all trained service meeting conductors using React Query and the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateCheckoutReco: Defines a mutation for updating a territory checkout record and invalidates related territory queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateGlobalNote.t: Mutation hook for updating a global note and refreshing the global notes list.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdatePioneer.ts: Updates pioneer records via actor API and invalidates the pioneers list cache.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdatePublisher.ts: Updates publisher data, mapping privilege selections to backend format, and invalidates the publishers list.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateTask.ts: Mutation hook for editing tasks and refreshing all task queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateTaskCompleti: Updates a task's completion status and invalidates task queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateTrainedCondu: Handles updates to trained conductors with success/error toasts and query invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind configuration and CSS variables for theme styling including custom Theiarco colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/ComingSoon.tsx: Simple placeholder page showing a coming soon message with themed styling.
frontend/src/pages/Login.tsx: Login page using Internet Identity authentication with styled UI components.
frontend/src/pages/Notes.tsx: Notes management page providing filtering, sorting, creating, editing, and deleting global notes.
frontend/src/pages/Pioneers.tsx: Page for listing, adding, editing, and deleting pioneers with modal-based UI.
frontend/src/pages/PublisherProfile.tsx: Displays a single publisher's details with edit and delete actions, loading states, and privilege badges.
frontend/src/pages/Publishers.tsx: Shows a filterable list of publishers with add, edit, and delete functionality and group/activity filters.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceMeetingConduct: Lists trained conductors with add, edit, and delete modals, including sorting and status badges.
frontend/src/pages/Shepherding.tsx: Manages shepherding visits with search, sorting, visit creation, editing, and deletion.
frontend/src/pages/ShepherdingVisitProfi: Displays a single shepherding visit with note editing, visit editing, and delete options.
frontend/src/pages/Tasks.tsx: Renders the tasks page with filtering, add/edit modals, completion toggling, and deletion workflows using task-related hooks.
frontend/src/pages/Territories.tsx: Displays a territories list with status coloring, checkout duration logic, row highlighting, and an add-territory modal.
frontend/src/pages/TerritoryProfile.tsx: Shows a detailed territory profile with edit/delete actions, checkout/return handling, and history/notes management modals.
frontend/src/utils/formatters.ts: Provides date formatting utilities converting backend timestamps in various units into readable date strings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage fallback.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugin setup for the project.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current build state for implementing a full CRUD UI for ServiceMeetingConductor with modal-based create/edit, table display, and delete confirmation. Lists architectural notes, existing features, and requirements for backend-connected operations.
